bulk.addAtLeastOne: Please add at least one range
bulk.rangeHint: Start values are 010, 020, 030..., end values from 010 to 990 (increment by 10).
bulk.structureHint:
Each prefix can have multiple middle codes and suffix ranges.
Final number format: prefix.middle.suffix (suffix increments by 10).

bulkText.title: Bulk Create Test Cases (Text Mode)
bulkText.help: One entry per line in the format "CaseNo,Title,Precondition,Steps,Expected Result,TCG,Priority". Fields after Title are optional. Use quotes if values contain commas. Provide TCG numbers separated by | when multiple. Priority supports High / Medium / Low (defaults to Medium).
bulkText.placeholder:
TC-1001,User Login,"Ensure test account exists","1. Open login page; 2. Enter valid credentials","Dashboard is displayed",TCG-10001,High
TC-1002,Invalid Password,,Enter wrong password,Error message displayed,,Low
TC-1003,API Health Check,"Service is running","Send GET /health","Service returns 200",TCG-10003|TCG-10005,Medium
bulkText.confirmDesc: The following {count} test cases will be created:
bulkText.notEnoughColumns: Each line must include at least case number and title.
bulkText.tooManyColumns: Too many columns detected. Expected up to 7 values.
bulkText.invalidPriority: Priority must be High, Medium, or Low.

bulkTextToast.conflict: Conflicting case numbers found: {count}. Marked with "(Conflict)" in the editor.
bulkTextToast.invalid: There are {count} invalid lines. Please fix them and try again.
bulkTextToast.networkError: Network error, please try again later
bulkTextToast.emptyInput: Please enter at least one line.
